MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA5 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Jackson Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.04PM. Our engineers are on site working to repair a fault on our underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.20PM on 2nd February 2021.
